name: Vybe
long_description:
We're 2 repeat YC founders building Vybe. We built Plato (W16, sold to Coda) and Wolfia (S22). Quang lead Product/GTM for Coda Solutions and Fabien is ex SWE at Meta and lead half of Engineering at Wealthfront before.

Vybe turns a simple chat prompt into a production-ready internal app. You connect your systems—Workday, Jira, Github, Salesforce, Snowflake, Slack—and the platform instantly generates the UI, backend, secure data pipelines, and role-based access control, then keeps everything up-to-date as your needs evolve. Built-in AI agents take care of repetitive follow-ups and status pings, so the tools you launch actually stay used.

Beyond code, Vybe ships proven playbooks. We partner with top engineering, product, and ops leaders—capturing how they run one-on-ones, all-hands, onboarding, and more—then release those workflows as plug-and-play templates you can adopt in a click. The result is a living system of bespoke apps plus best-practice processes that scales with your company from day one.
